meaningMnemonic:
I <kanji>recommend</kanji> this to you, so I'd like to <kanji>invite</kanji> you to try it. This is a <vocabulary>solicitation</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>invitation</vocabulary>.

This word describes inviting someone to join a group or activity, often with a pushy or persistent tone. It's commonly used in business, religious, or social settings.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
